00027 const int RADIO = 120;
00028 const double ECLIPTIC = 23.5 *( tgc::Pi/180 );

00085 void CelestialWidget::CoordinatesChanged( cSunCoordinates coordinates )
00086 {
00087         m_rightAscension = coordinates.dRightAscension;
00088         m_rightValue->setText( QString::number( m_rightAscension ) );
00089         m_declination = coordinates.dDeclination;
00090         m_declinationValue->setText( QString::number( m_declination ) );
00091         
00092         //Right Ascension
00093         SoSeparator* ascension = RightAscension();
00094         m_rootNode->replaceChild( 5, ascension );
00095         
00096         //Declination
00097         SoSeparator* declination = Declination();
00098         m_rootNode->replaceChild( 6, declination );
00099         
00100         //Star
00101         SoSeparator* star = Star();
00102         m_rootNode->replaceChild( 7, star );
00103 }

00107 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::CelestialEquator( int r ) const
00108 {
00109         SoSeparator* ecuador = new SoSeparator;
00110         
00111         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00112         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.80f);   // Olive
00113         ecuador->addChild(myMaterial);
00114         
00115         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00116         drawstyle->lineWidth = 2;
00117         ecuador->addChild( drawstyle );
00118         
00119         
00120         float p[360][3];
00121         for( int fi = 0; fi<360; fi++ )
00122         {
00123                 p[fi][0] = -sin( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) )*r ;
00124         p[fi][1] =  0.0;
00125         p[fi][2] = -cos( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) )*r ;
00126                 
00127         }
00128         
00129         int lines[1]={360};
00130         SoCoordinate3 * coord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00131         coord3->point.setValues(0, 360, p);
00132         ecuador->addChild(coord3);
00133                 
00134         SoLineSet* lineset=new SoLineSet;
00135         lineset->numVertices.setValues(0,1,lines);
00136         ecuador->addChild(lineset);     
00137         
00138         return ecuador;
00139 
00140         
00141 }
00142 
00143 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::Declination()
00144 {
00145         //Decliantion
00146         SoSeparator* declination = new SoSeparator; 
00147 
00148         SoMaterial* declinationMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00149         declinationMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 1.0f, 0.5f, 0.0 );   // Green
00150         declination->addChild( declinationMaterial );
00151         
00152         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00153         drawstyle->lineWidth = 4;
00154         declination->addChild( drawstyle );
00155         
00156         float declinationPoints[360][3];
00157         
00158         for( int theta = 0; theta< 360; theta++ )
00159         {
00160                 double grad = ( m_declination / 360 ) * theta;
00161                 declinationPoints[theta][0] = sin( m_rightAscension ) * cos( grad )* RADIO;
00162         declinationPoints[theta][1] = sin( grad ) * RADIO;
00163         declinationPoints[theta][2] = cos( m_rightAscension ) * cos( grad ) * RADIO ;
00164         }
00165         
00166         
00167         int declinationLines[1] = {360};
00168         SoCoordinate3 * declinationCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00169         declinationCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 360, declinationPoints );
00170         declination->addChild( declinationCoord3 );
00171         
00172         SoLineSet* decliantionLine=new SoLineSet;
00173         decliantionLine->numVertices.setValues( 0, 1, declinationLines );
00174         declination->addChild( decliantionLine );
00175         
00176         
00177         SoSeparator* curve = new SoSeparator;
00178         declination->addChild( curve );
00179         
00180         SoMaterial* curveMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00181         curveMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 1.0, 0.50f, 0.0 );   // Orange
00182         //curveMaterial->transparency.setValue( 0.3f );
00183         curve->addChild( curveMaterial );
00184         
00185         float curvePoints[270][3];
00186         Point3D center( 0, 0, 0 );
00187 
00188         int numPoints = 0;
00189         int indexes[360];
00190         for( int index = 1; index <= 90; index ++ )
00191         {
00192                 curvePoints[numPoints][0]= center.x;
00193                 curvePoints[numPoints][1]= center.y;
00194                 curvePoints[numPoints][2]= center.z;
00195                 indexes[ ( index -1 ) * 4 ] = numPoints;
00196                 numPoints++;
00197                 
00198                 double grad1 = ( m_declination / 360 ) * 4 * ( index -1 );
00199                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( m_rightAscension ) * cos( grad1 )* RADIO;
00200         curvePoints[numPoints][1] =  sin( grad1 ) * RADIO;
00201         curvePoints[numPoints][2] = cos( m_rightAscension ) * cos( grad1 ) * RADIO ;
00202         indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) +1 ] = numPoints;
00203                 numPoints++;
00204                 
00205                 double grad2 = ( m_declination / 360 ) * 4 * index;
00206                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( m_rightAscension ) * cos( grad1 )* RADIO;
00207         curvePoints[numPoints][1] =  sin( grad2 ) * RADIO;
00208         curvePoints[numPoints][2] = cos( m_rightAscension ) * cos( grad2 ) * RADIO ;
00209         indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) +2 ] = numPoints;
00210                 numPoints++;
00211                 
00212                 indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) + 3 ] = -1;
00213         
00214         }
00215         
00216         
00217         SoCoordinate3 * curveCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00218         curveCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 270, curvePoints );
00219         curve->addChild( curveCoord3 );
00220         
00221         SoIndexedFaceSet* facet = new SoIndexedFaceSet;
00222         facet->coordIndex.setValues( 0, 360, indexes );
00223         curve->addChild( facet );
00224         
00225         return declination;
00226 }

00228 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::Ecliptic() const
00229 {
00230         SoSeparator* ecliptic = new SoSeparator;
00231         
00232         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00233         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.80f, 0.80f, 0.0f);   // Olive
00234         ecliptic->addChild(myMaterial);
00235         
00236         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00237         drawstyle->lineWidth = 2;
00238         ecliptic->addChild( drawstyle );
00239         
00240         float p[360][3];
00241         for( int fi = 0; fi<360; fi++ )
00242         {
00243                 p[fi][0] = cos( ECLIPTIC ) * sin( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO;
00244         p[fi][1] =  sin( ECLIPTIC ) * sin( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO;
00245         p[fi][2] = -cos( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO;
00246                 
00247         }
00248         
00249         int lines[1]={360};
00250         SoCoordinate3 * coord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00251         coord3->point.setValues(0, 360, p);
00252         ecliptic->addChild(coord3);
00253                 
00254         SoLineSet* lineset=new SoLineSet;
00255         lineset->numVertices.setValues(0,1,lines);
00256         ecliptic->addChild(lineset);    
00257         
00258         return ecliptic;
00259 }

00416 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::RightAscension()
00417 {
00418         //Right Ascension
00419         SoSeparator* ascension = new SoSeparator; 
00420         
00421         SoSeparator* right = new SoSeparator; 
00422         ascension->addChild( right );

00429         drawstyle->lineWidth = 3;
00430         right->addChild( drawstyle );
00431         
00432         
00433         float ascensionPoints[360][3];
00434         for( int fi = 0; fi < 360; fi++ )
00435         {
00436                 double grad = ( m_rightAscension / 360 ) * fi;
00437                 ascensionPoints[fi][0] = sin( grad )* RADIO ;
00438         ascensionPoints[fi][1] =  0.0;
00439         ascensionPoints[fi][2] = cos( grad ) * RADIO ;
00440                 
00441         }

00445         ascensionCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 360, ascensionPoints );

00449         ascensionLine->numVertices.setValues( 0, 1, ascensionLines );
00450         right->addChild( ascensionLine );
00451         
00452         SoSeparator* curve = new SoSeparator;
00453                 
00454         SoMaterial* curveMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00455         curveMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 1.0, 0.50f, 0.0 );   // Orange
00456         //curveMaterial->transparency.setValue( 0.3f );
00457         curve->addChild( curveMaterial );
00458         
00459         float curvePoints[270][3];

00466                 curvePoints[numPoints][0]= center.x;

00503 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::Sphere(int r) const
00504 {
00505         SoSeparator* sph = new SoSeparator;
00506   
00507         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00508         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );   // Blue
00509         myMaterial->transparency.setValue( 0.3f );
00510         sph->addChild( myMaterial );
00511         
00512         SoComplexity* complexity = new SoComplexity;
00513         complexity->value = 0.5;
00514         sph->addChild( complexity );
00515         
00516         SoSphere* sphere=new SoSphere;
00517         sphere->radius=r;
00518         sph->addChild(sphere);
00519         
00520 
00521 
00522         return sph;
00523 }
00524 
00525 SoSeparator* CelestialWidget::Star() 
00526 {               
00527         //Star definition
00528         SoSeparator* star = new SoSeparator;
00529         
00530         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00531         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue(1.0, 1.0, 0.0);   // yellow
00532         star->addChild(myMaterial);
00533   
00534         SoTranslation* starTransform = new SoTranslation;
00535         starTransform->translation.setValue( cos( m_declination )* sin( m_rightAscension ) * RADIO, sin( m_declination ) * RADIO, cos( m_declination )* cos( m_rightAscension)  * RADIO ) ;
00536         star->addChild( starTransform);
00537         
00538         SoSphere* starSphere=new SoSphere;
00539         starSphere->radius=10;
00540         star->addChild(starSphere);
00541         
00542         return star; 
00543 
00544 }
